title: Heart of Ice and Flame
overview: Three thousand years ago, Mo Bing was betrayed and had her heart gouged out, transforming her into a half-human, half-puppet existence. In pursuit of regaining her human form, Mo Bing searched for a millennium and finally discovered the "Heart of Flame." However, its owner, Mu Yuanqi, held a triple identity just like her. When Mo Bing forcefully married into his household, a series of tests and tensions unfolded. Slowly, a drama filled with purpose and conspiracy, both sweet and torturous, began to unfurl.
